trans-unit.source: Exposes and updates membership user information stored in an Active Directory data store.
trans-unit.target: Expõe e atualiza as informações de usuário de associação, armazenadas em um repositório de dados do Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: The ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser object is used to represent a single membership user in the Active Directory membership data store.
trans-unit.target: O objeto ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser é usado para representar um usuário da associação único no repositório de dados de associação do Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: It exposes information about the membership user such as the e-mail address, and provides functionality for the membership user such as the ability to change or reset his or her password.
trans-unit.target: Ele exibe informações sobre o usuário de associação, como o endereço de email e fornece funcionalidade para o usuário de associação, como a capacidade de alterar ou redefinir sua senha.

trans-unit.source: An ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser object is returned by the application's membership provider whenever the application is configured to use an Active Directory data store.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto de ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser é retornado pelo provedor de associação do aplicativo sempre que o aplicativo está configurado para usar um repositório de dados do Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: In an application that can be configured to use different data stores, or in an application that uses multiple data stores, you can refer to the base class, <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser>.
trans-unit.target: Em um aplicativo que pode ser configurado usar dados diferentes armazena ou em um aplicativo que usa vários repositórios de dados, você pode se referir à classe base, <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser>.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser>

trans-unit.source: Because the ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser object does not implement the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate%2A> properties, you must be prepared to handle the <xref:System.NotSupportedException> that is thrown when these members are accessed on an ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser object.
trans-unit.target: Porque o objeto ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser não implementa o <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A>e <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate%2A>Propriedades, você deve estar preparado para lidar com o <xref:System.NotSupportedException>que é lançada quando esses membros são acessados em um objeto ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.</xref:System.NotSupportedException> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser class implements internal optimizations used by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider> class to minimize the number of attribute updates that occur when calling the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: A classe ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser implementa otimizações internas usadas pelo <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>classe para minimizar o número de atualizações de atributo que ocorrem ao chamar o <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>

trans-unit.source: It also serializes the <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier> representation (available in the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey%2A> property) so that an ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser object can be serialized and deserialized without throwing exceptions.
trans-unit.target: Também serializar o <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier>representação (disponível no <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey%2A>propriedade) para que um objeto ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser pode ser serializado e desserializado sem gerar exceções.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey%2A> </xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier>

trans-unit.source: A ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser object is returned by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A> methods or as part of a <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection> returned by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser é retornado pela <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A>e <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>métodos ou como parte de um <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection>retornado pelo <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: An ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser object is required by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> method when you want to update the information for an existing membership user.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser é necessário para o <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A>método quando você deseja atualizar as informações para um usuário de associação existente.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser properties are mapped to Active Directory attributes.
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser são mapeadas para atributos do Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser properties and their default attribute mappings.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir lista as propriedades de ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser e seus mapeamentos de atributo padrão.

trans-unit.source: |Property|Default directory attribute|Can be mapped?| |--------------|---------------------------------|--------------------| |<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey%2A>|`securityIdentifier`|No| |<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UserName%2A>|`userPrincipalName`|Yes, but must be either userPrincipalName or sAMAccountName| |<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Comment%2A>|`comment`|No| |<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.CreationDate%2A>|`whenCreated`|No| |<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Email%2A>|`mail`|Yes, but must be a single-valued attribute of type Unicode String.| |<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A>|n/a|Not supported by <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>.| |<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate%2A>|n/a|Not supported by <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>.| |<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastPasswordChangedDate%2A>|`pwdLastSet`|No| |<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.PasswordQuestion%2A>|none, but must be mapped to an attribute if using question-and-answer security for password reset or retrieval.|Yes, but must be a single-valued attribute of type Unicode String.| |<xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.IsApproved%2A>|`User-Account-Control` (AD)
trans-unit.target: | Propriedade | Atributo de diretório padrão | Pode ser mapeado? | |--------------|---------------------------------|--------------------| | <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey%2A>| `securityIdentifier`| Não | | <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UserName%2A>| `userPrincipalName`| Sim, mas deve ser userPrincipalName ou sAMAccountName | | <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Comment%2A>| `comment`| Não | | <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.CreationDate%2A>| `whenCreated`| Não | | <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Email%2A>| `mail`| Sim, mas deve ser um atributo de valor único do tipo cadeia de caracteres Unicode. | | <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A>|n/a| Não há suportada por <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>. | | <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate%2A>|n/a| Não há suportada por <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>. | | <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastPasswordChangedDate%2A>| `pwdLastSet`| Não | | <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.PasswordQuestion%2A>| none, mas deve ser mapeada para um atributo se usando perguntas e respostas segurança para redefinição de senha ou recuperação. | Sim, mas deve ser um atributo de valor único do tipo cadeia de caracteres Unicode. | | <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.IsApproved%2A>| `User-Account-Control` (AD)</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.IsApproved%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.PasswordQuestion%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastPasswordChangedDate%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Email%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.CreationDate%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Comment%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UserName%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: `mDS-UserAccountDisabled` (ADAM)|No| |<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut%2A>|computed from `lockoutTime` and the AD lockout duration (AD on Windows 2000)
trans-unit.target: `mDS-UserAccountDisabled`(ADAM) | Não | | <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut%2A>| computada a partir de `lockoutTime` e a duração do bloqueio de AD (anúncio no Windows 2000)</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut%2A>

trans-unit.source: `msDS-User-Account-Control-Computed` (AD on Windows Server 2003)
trans-unit.target: `msDS-User-Account-Control-Computed`(AD no Windows Server 2003)

trans-unit.source: `msDS-User-Account-Control-Computed` (ADAM)|No| |<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastLockoutDate%2A>|If locked out due to too many bad password attempts, the lockout time attribute is returned.
trans-unit.target: `msDS-User-Account-Control-Computed`(ADAM) | Não | | <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastLockoutDate%2A>| Se bloqueada devido a muitas tentativas de senha incorreta, o atributo de tempo de bloqueio é retornado.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastLockoutDate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If locked out due to too many bad password answer attempts, the value stored in the attribute defined by `attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerLockoutTime` is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se bloqueada devido a resposta de senha incorreta muitas tentativas, o valor armazenado no atributo definido pelo `attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerLockoutTime` será retornado.

trans-unit.source: If locked out due to both a bad password and too many bad password attempts, the most recent date/time value is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se bloqueada devido a uma senha incorreta e a senha incorreta muitas tentativas, será retornado o valor de data/hora mais recente.

trans-unit.source: If the account is not locked out, return 1/1/1753 for SQL compatibility.|No|
trans-unit.target: Se a conta não está bloqueada, retornar 1/1/1753 para compatibilidade do SQL. | Não |

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of an <xref href="System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser"></xref> object for a class that inherits the <xref href="System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância de um <xref href="System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser"> </xref> objeto para uma classe que herda de <xref href="System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser constructor is not intended to be used from your code.
trans-unit.target: O construtor ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser não se destina a ser usado em seu código.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser"></xref> class with the specified property values.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser"> </xref> classe com os valores de propriedade especificado.

trans-unit.source: Creating a new <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> object does not add a new membership user object to the membership data store.
trans-unit.target: Criando um novo <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>objeto não adiciona um novo objeto de usuário de associação para o repositório de dados de associação.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>

trans-unit.source: To add a new membership user to the membership data store, use the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para adicionar um novo usuário associado ao repositório de associação de dados, use o <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A> method returns an <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> object for the membership user added to the data store.
trans-unit.target: Observe que o <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>método retorna um <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>objeto do usuário da associação adicionado ao repositório de dados.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> objects are commonly constructed in application code for use with the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> method, although you can also pass an <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> object returned from the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A> method to the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> method as well.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>objetos geralmente são construídos em código do aplicativo para uso com o <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A>método, embora você também pode passar um <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>objeto retornado do <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A>, ou <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A>método para o <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A>método bem.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> objects are also commonly constructed by membership provider implementations for the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>objetos normalmente são construídos por implementações do provedor de associação para o <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByEmail%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.FindUsersByName%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.UpdateUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetAllUsers%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.GetUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.CreateUser%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.ProviderName*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.ProviderName*>do usuário da associação.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.ProviderName*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UserName*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UserName*>do usuário da associação.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.UserName*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey*>do usuário da associação.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.ProviderUserKey*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Email*> address of the membership user.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Email*>endereço do usuário da associação.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Email*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.PasswordQuestion*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.PasswordQuestion*>do usuário da associação.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.PasswordQuestion*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Comment*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Comment*>do usuário da associação.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.Comment*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.IsApproved*> value for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.IsApproved*>valor para o usuário associado.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.IsApproved*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut*> value for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut*>valor para o usuário associado.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.IsLockedOut*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.CreationDate*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.CreationDate*>do usuário da associação.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.CreationDate*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate*>do usuário da associação.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastLoginDate*>

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not used.
trans-unit.target: Esse parâmetro não for usado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate*>do usuário da associação.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser.LastActivityDate*>

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not used.
trans-unit.target: Esse parâmetro não for usado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastPasswordChangedDate*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastPasswordChangedDate*>do usuário da associação.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastPasswordChangedDate*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastLockoutDate*> for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastLockoutDate*>do usuário da associação.</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipUser.LastLockoutDate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets application-specific information for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define informações específicas do aplicativo para o usuário associado.

trans-unit.source: The Comment property can be used to store custom information for a membership user that is specific to an application.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de comentário pode ser usada para armazenar informações personalizadas para um usuário de associação que é específica para um aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The amount of information that can be stored in the `Comment` property for an <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> is defined by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>.
trans-unit.target: A quantidade de informações que podem ser armazenadas no `Comment` propriedade para um que <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>é definido por <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>

trans-unit.source: The Comment property is mapped to the `Comment` default Active Directory attribute.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de comentário é mapeada para o `Comment` atributo do padrão do Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be remapped to another attribute.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não pode ser remapeada para outro atributo.

trans-unit.source: Application-specific information for the Active Directory member stored in the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Comment" name="Comment" href=""></xref> directory attribute.
trans-unit.target: Informações específicas do aplicativo para o membro do Active Directory armazenado no <xref uid="langword_csharp_Comment" name="Comment" href=""> </xref> atributo de diretório.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the e-mail address of the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o endereço de email do usuário.

trans-unit.source: The Email property is mapped to the `Mail` directory attribute.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de Email é mapeada para o `Mail` atributo de diretório.

trans-unit.source: This property can be remapped in the Web.config file by setting the `attributeMapUserName` attribute in the [providers Element for profile (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/9e998377-b07f-44c1-ad9b-20a60e83c18f) element for profiles.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade pode ser remapeada no arquivo Web. config, definindo o `attributeMapUserName` atributo o [provedores de elemento para o perfil (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/9e998377-b07f-44c1-ad9b-20a60e83c18f) elemento para perfis.

trans-unit.source: The e-mail address of the membership user.
trans-unit.target: O endereço de email do usuário.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the membership user can be authenticated.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o usuário de associação pode ser autenticado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> value for a membership user is checked during the call to <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>valor para um usuário de associação é verificada durante a chamada para <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A>por <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider>.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>

trans-unit.source: If the IsApproved property returns `false`, the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> method returns `false` even if the supplied user name and password are correct.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade IsApproved retorna `false`, o <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A>método retorna `false` mesmo se o nome de usuário fornecido e a senha estão corretos.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A>

trans-unit.source: The IsApproved property is mapped to one of the following Active Directory attributes.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade IsApproved é mapeada para um dos seguintes atributos do Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: ||| |-|-| |Active Directory|`User-Account-Control`| |Active Directory Application Mode|`msDS-UserAccountDisabled`| This property cannot be remapped to another attribute.
trans-unit.target: ||| |-|-| | Active Directory | `User-Account-Control`| | Modo de aplicativo do Active Directory | `msDS-UserAccountDisabled`| Essa propriedade não pode ser remapeada para outro atributo.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user can be authenticated; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o usuário pode ser autenticado; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception in all cases
trans-unit.target: Gera uma <xref:System.NotSupportedException>exceção em todos os casos</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: The LastActivityDate property is not supported by the <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser> class.
trans-unit.target: Não há suporte para a propriedade LastActivityDate, a <xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>classe.</xref:System.Web.Security.ActiveDirectoryMembershipUser>

trans-unit.source: Attempting to get or set the value will always throw a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: Tentativa de obter ou definir o valor sempre fará <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: Always throws a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception.
trans-unit.target: Sempre gera um <xref:System.NotSupportedException>exceção.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: any attempt to get or set the LastActivityDate property.
trans-unit.target: qualquer tentativa de obter ou definir a propriedade LastActivityDate.

trans-unit.source: Gets the user identifier from the Active Directory data store for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o identificador de usuário do armazenamento de dados do Active Directory para o usuário associado.

trans-unit.source: The ProviderUserKey property exposes the identifier from the membership data source generically typed as an `object`.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade ProviderUserKey expõe o identificador da associação de fonte de dados genericamente digitada como um `object`.

trans-unit.source: The ProviderUserKey class can be cast as a <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier> object.
trans-unit.target: A classe ProviderUserKey pode ser convertida como um <xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier>objeto.</xref:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier>

trans-unit.source: The user identifier from the Active Directory data store for the membership user.
trans-unit.target: Armazenar o identificador do usuário de dados do Active Directory para o usuário associado.
